text.name: info1
text.text: Is a platform game developed by Core Design originally for the Acorn Archimedes, Amiga, Atari ST, Amstrad CPC, ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64, and MS-DOS. The game was released in 1989 and published by MicroProse on the Firebird Software label in the UK, and on the MicroPlay label in America.

text.text: Ist ein Plattformspiel, das von Core Design ursprünglich für Acorn Archimedes, Amiga, Atari ST, Amstrad CPC, ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64 und MS-DOS entwickelt wurde.
